articles.author: David Goldman
articles.title: No one can seem to kill America’s economy, despite everyone’s best efforts - CNN
articles.description: Americans hate this economy, but they keep spending like they love it.
articles.content:
Americans hate this economy, but they keep spending like they love it.
The Commerce Department reported Friday that consumer spending rose 0.6% in August. Although that may not sound like a lot, it … [+7033 chars]
